title: When mid laners see the Blue Buff spawn
body:
https://tarajohnsonauthor.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/give-me-i-need.gif

{{champion:9}} But I need the blue buff! 
{{champion:238}} Shut up noob all the pros give their mid laner the buff for a reason

replies.body:
But what if the jungler _is_ the midlaner?

https://media.giphy.com/media/LR5aS2cMz7i36/giphy.gif
I feel good knowing who made this.
It's a lot less cute than that but yeah pretty much.

Very true. I replaced it. 

Here is the original in case someone wants it:
https://i.imgur.com/1Nn9o5C.gif?Noredirect

"No."

Four minutes later, mid lane takes 3/4 hp damage soloing the blue buff and immediately feeds it to the enemy mid laner after they get back to lane.
I'll just come down from top and take it while they are argueing, as {{champion:266}} needs it more.
